context:
Wow. You can’t even comment on planets in the night sky. Bummer. 

(June 7, 2022)

replies.context: They figured there was no way you could make yourself look ridiculous in this article I guess :D

context: What to know? Just like a 'swiss cheese' moon, you can't eat a strawberry moon either!
OMGoodness! Is Fox letting us comment on a science article? Unbelievable!

replies.context: God babblers are not welcome here.

context: Careful now. The Woke crowd will want to cancel the moon if it doesn't comply with the narrative.
